setUp()¶

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

stage = '1'¶
tags = {'unit'}¶
test_simple_opts_selection()¶

Tests that a selection of simple OPTS modules is correct, not considering any STRANDS that may overlap.

test_simple_selection_is_valid()¶

Assert that a simple made up stage 1 selection is correct - i.e, core modules.

test_simple_selection_with_disc_alts()¶

Test a selection in stage 1 with disc_alt modules is valid/invalid

test_strand_selection()¶

Tests the Strand OptionRules. This test begins with a simple selection of only STRANDS modules, and then tests whether extra STRAND modules can successfully ‘spill over’ into OPTS.
